sentences.en: And my buddy McDade was doing it, so I felt some camaraderie and competition.
sentences.cn: 我的伙伴麦克达德也正在训练, 所以我感到有些羡慕和挑战.

sentences.en: I loathe the fake camaraderie, excessive alcohol consumption and hideous vulgarity.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌虚情假意 、 过度饮酒和言行粗鄙.

sentences.en: Ita perfect day for riding . Great weather. Great camaraderie.
sentences.cn: 天气完美. 伙伴同道. 我感谢上帝给我们这麽好的一天.

sentences.en: Its wraparound U - lounges fore and aft, invite friendly conversation and camaraderie.
sentences.cn: 它的概括U型前方休息室,纵向, 邀请友好的交谈和享受爱情.

sentences.en: The camaraderie among fellow employees made the tedious work just bearable.
sentences.cn: 同事之间的情谊使枯燥乏味的工作变得还能忍受.

sentences.en: the camaraderie of the women’s basketball team
sentences.cn: 女子篮球队的队友情谊

sentences.en: There's clearly great camaraderie amongst everyone at Carrington – what are your funniest memories so far?
sentences.cn: 在卡灵顿大家感情都很好,你记忆最深的是 什么 ?

sentences.en: They took us in, enfolded us in joyous camaraderie.
sentences.cn: 他们把我们领了进去, 使我们融入了令人欣喜的暖意洋洋的气氛之中.

sentences.en: This good - fellowship - camaraderie - usually occurs through similarity of pursuits.
sentences.cn: 这种融洽 -- 这种志同道合者之间的情谊 -- 通常是通过追求相同的目标而产生的.

trans.tran_en: a feeling of friendship that a group of people have, especially when they work together
